name: Slimefrog Demo
description:
Warning: This game is very difficult and may induce fits of rage

Use your tongue as a grappling hook to navigate up an exotic and unforgiving world, while being verbally abused by a flying snake. 


Experience the pain of losing all your progress, and then being mocked for it!

Be careful, any fall can send you all the way back down...

Explore 9 Distinct Areas!


This is just a demo, but the full version will be available very soon on Steam. Only the first 3 areas can be accessed through this demo. Thanks for playing! 

Please Wishlist!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1714680/Slimefrog/

If you beat the demo

Upon beating the demo, the number of licks, time taken, and number of falls will be displayed. If you somehow manage this, please share a screenshot of your stats! 

If you want to give feedback, you can contact me via the comment section or via Twitter.  I'd really appreciate any feedback or bug reports!

https://twitter.com/ETHERBOUND_game
